bgDescription: A rare material from the Bell-Borne Geochelone, which only appears at a specific frequency. It's said that in the hands of a skilled apothecary, it can be refined into a miraculous medicine.
description: A special material from the Bell-Borne Geochelone.
obtainDescription: A rare material that only resonates under specific frequencies from the Bell-Borne Geochelone. It's said that in the hands of a skilled apothecary, it can be refined into a miraculous medicine.
